public class NormdataResource
extends java.lang.Object

 @Path(value="/get/{url}/{template}/{lang}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String getNormData(@PathParam(value="url")

                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="template")

                                                                                                                           de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ContentNotFoundException,
                                                                                                                           de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ServiceNotAllowedException
        Retrieves JSON representation of norm data fetched via the given URL. Only fields configured for the given template are returned (_DEFAULT if template is null or not found).
        Parameters:
        url -
        template - Type of normdata set (person, corporation, etc.)
        lang - Locale for field name translations
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PresentationException
        IndexUnreachableException
        DAOException
        java.net.MalformedURLException

        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.ServiceNotAllowedException
